virtual bool brics_3d::rsg::IIdGenerator::removeIdFromPool ( unsigned int  id) [pure virtual]

Notify the ID generator to remove a certain ID from the ID pool.

Parameters:
idThe ID to be removed.
Returns:
True if ID was sucessfully removed. False if ID is invalid. E.g. it exists already.
